Text: Princess Iris, now!
Right, leave it to me!
Grarrr...
It looks like he's finally calmed down... Oh?

What's this? The troublemaker Merry Whip is
approaching Princess Iris!

Oh? It seems you're the one who can handle him,
Princess Iris.
Heheh. Good boy...

Looks like you two will make a great team. I'll have
to pick another one...

Alright, ready. Princess Iris, let's have a good
race.
Yes, let's do it. No holding back!

Princess Iris and Lady Beatrix are on their reindeer
and have started the race!

However, despite their initial struggles, the other
participants are already ahead! Can the two catch up?!

Merry Whip, was it? You don't like losing either,
do you?

Looks like those two are super motivated... We can't
fall behind.

Whoa... Both of them are moving at incredible speeds!
This is heading for a surprising twist!
Well then, let's make our way to town first!

And now, the first to arrive in town after navigating
the snowfields and forest is—

Princess Iris and Lady Beatrix! It's now a
head-to-head race! Who will cross the
finish line first...?!
Race to the finish!
This is the moment of truth...!
...GOAAAAAL!!! And the verdict is...

I-I-Incredible! Princess Iris and Miss Beatrix are
tied for first place!

*huff, huff* I thought I could pull ahead...but it
looks like I was over-optimistic.

No, you managed to control that wild reindeer all the
way here. That's nothing short of impressive.

It's an honor to hear you say that, Lady Beatrix.
...It was a fun competition.
I agree. It's been a while since I felt so fired up.

Let's compete again sometime. Whether a reindeer race
or...a sword fight.
You bet. I look forward to it.
Later, after all the evaluations are completed...

Now, let's announce the results. This year's "Saint"
is...

Princess Iris and Miss Beatrix! Both of you are the
winners!
Heheh... I graciously accept, along with Lady Beatrix.
Yes. I accept the title of "Saint" with gratitude.

Congratulations to both of you! And that wraps up
this year's Saint Selection Ceremony. See you all
next year!
Thank you for accompanying me throughout the day.
I enjoyed myself as well. It was an intriguing event.
But...sadly, my niece wasn't there either.

...I see. I'm sorry I couldn't be of any help once
again...
Not to worry. Your support is always helpful.

Please, it's nothing. As fellow believers in the
value of family, I'll always be there to assist you.

Thank you. That means a lot... I'm lucky to have a
friend like you.

Well then, I'll go change now. I can't go home in
these clothes...
Um... May I come in for a moment?
Alexia...! What're you doing here?

I saw the Saint Selection Ceremony.
Congratulations...to both you and Lady Beatrix.

Yes, thank you. Did you come all this way just to
tell me that...?

I-It was a coincidence! I just happened to see the
ceremony...and to pass by the green room...!

(Despite what she's saying, she must have come to see
me... I'm touched.)

(If I'm going to ask her, now is the time... I made
up my mind to confront her and not run away...!)
Alexia, there's something I want to ask you...
Wh-What is it...?

Why have you been avoiding me lately? If there's a
reason, I'd like to know.
Um, well, you see...!

Of course, whatever you tell me, I'll listen without
judging.

If you don't want to talk about it right now, that's
fine too. But if there's anything I can do—
H-Here...!
Huh...? What's this...? A package from Mitsugoshi?
It's a Holiday...gift.
F-For me...?! I-In that case...here!
You got a gift for me, too...?

Yes. I really wanted to give it to you... I heard
that people in town exchange gifts with their
loved ones during the Holidays.

...Happy Holidays, Alexia. Isn't this how you're
supposed to celebrate it?
That's right... Happy Holidays, Iris.
...What a lovely scene.

I-I'm so sorry! I wasn't being considerate to you,
Lady Beatrix...

No need to apologize. I wouldn't want to intrude on
such a beautiful bond between sisters.
Anyway, aren't you two going to open your gifts?
R-Right. Well then...
...A stuffed bear.

...Isn't it adorable? I also bought a Santa outfit
for it. I thought it'd be nice to display in your
room... Hehe.
Sure, I'll do that. Well, Iris, open yours as well.

Yes, of course. I wonder what you could've gotten for
me.
...Wh-Wh-Wh-What is this?!

It's a thong. When you saw it at Mitsugoshi
before, you said it was shameless...

But considering your outfit today...I figured your
perspective might have changed. Your outfit really
suits you, so why not wear this, too...!

Th-This outfit is for the Saint Selection Ceremony.
I didn't have a choice...!

A thong...? I've never seen one, but it looks like
it would be easy to move in.
Lady Beatrix?!
Hmm. It seems to be made of good material.

Yes, it's incredibly comfortable to wear. Come on,
Iris, try it on!
S-Seriously...Alexia!

As they chat in the green room, the three feel the
warmth of family bonds...
